Privacy.title: Privacy Policy
Privacy.footerNote: By using SmartSRT, you acknowledge that you have read and understood this Privacy Policy.

section1.title: 1. Introduction
section1.content: At SmartSRT, your privacy is our top priority. This Privacy Policy outlines how we collect, use, process, and protect your personal information when you use our AI-powered subtitle generation platform. We are committed to transparency and ensuring your data rights are respected.

subsection1.title: 3.1 Account Information
items: Full name and email address
Encrypted password
Profile picture (optional)
Third-party authentication data (Google, if applicable)

subsection2.title: 3.2 Content and Media Files
items: Uploaded video files and audio content
Generated subtitles and transcriptions
File metadata (size, format, upload date)
Translation settings

subsection3.title: 3.3 Subscription and Payment Data
items: Subscription plan and status
Usage history
Payment processor customer ID (Paddle)
Billing dates and transaction history

subsection4.title: 3.4 Usage and Technical Data
items: Platform interaction logs and feature usage
Login timestamps and session information
Device information and browser type
IP address and approximate location

section4.title: 4. How We Collect Data
items: Information you provide directly during registration and platform use
Automated collection during video uploads and subtitle processing
Third-party authentication providers (Google OAuth, with your consent)
Payment processor integration (Paddle)
Cookies and similar tracking technologies

section5.title: 5. Purpose and Legal Basis for Processing

subsection1.title: 5.1 Service Delivery
items: Account creation and authentication
AI-powered subtitle generation and translation
Video processing and transcription services

subsection2.title: 5.2 Billing and Payments
items: Processing subscription fees and credit purchases
Invoice generation and payment verification
Managing refunds and cancellations

subsection3.title: 5.3 Customer Support
items: Responding to support inquiries and technical issues
Improving platform features and user experience
Troubleshooting and resolving service problems

subsection4.title: 5.4 Legal Compliance
items: Maintaining tax and accounting records
Responding to legal requests and court orders
Fraud prevention and security monitoring

section6.title: 6. Data Sharing and Third Parties
section6.intro: We do not sell your personal data to third parties. We only share data in the following circumstances:

aiProviders.title: AI Service Providers
aiProviders.description: Video content and audio is processed by AI providers (OpenAI, Anthropic, or similar) for subtitle generation. This data is used only for processing and is not stored permanently by these providers.

paymentProcessor.title: Payment Processor
paymentProcessor.description: Billing information is processed through Paddle for subscription management and payment processing.

authServices.title: Authentication Services
authServices.description: If you use Google sign-in, authentication data is shared with Google (with your explicit consent).

legalRequirements.title: Legal Requirements
legalRequirements.description: We may disclose data when required by law, court order, or to protect our legal rights.

section8.title: 8. Data Security Measures
section8.intro: We implement industry-standard security measures to protect your personal data:

encryption.title: Encryption
encryption.description: SSL/TLS encryption for all data transmission

dataBackup.title: Data Backup
dataBackup.description: Regular backups and disaster recovery systems

section9.title: 9. Your Privacy Rights
section9.intro: Under applicable data protection laws (including GDPR), you have the following rights:

rightToAccess.title: Right to Access
rightToAccess.description: Request a copy of all personal data we hold about you

rightToRectification.title: Right to Rectification
rightToRectification.description: Request correction of inaccurate or incomplete data

rightToErasure.title: Right to Erasure
rightToErasure.description: Request deletion of your personal data (right to be forgotten)

rightToObject.title: Right to Object
rightToObject.description: Object to processing of your data for specific purposes

rightToDataPortability.title: Right to Data Portability
rightToDataPortability.description: Receive your data in a structured, machine-readable format

rightToRestrictProcessing.title: Right to Restrict Processing
rightToRestrictProcessing.description: Request limitation of how we process your data

section10.title: 10. Cookies and Tracking
section10.intro: We use cookies and similar technologies to improve your experience:

essentialCookies.title: Essential Cookies
essentialCookies.description: Required for core functionality like authentication and security

functionalCookies.title: Functional Cookies
functionalCookies.description: Remember your preferences such as language and theme settings

analyticsCookies.title: Analytics Cookies
analyticsCookies.description: Help us understand usage patterns to improve our service (anonymized)

section11.title: 11. International Data Transfers
section11.intro: Your data may be transferred and processed outside your country of residence for the following purposes:
items: Payment processing through Paddle (EU-compliant)
AI processing services (with appropriate safeguards)
Cloud infrastructure services (GDPR-compliant providers)
section11.outro: All international transfers are conducted in accordance with applicable data protection laws.

section12.title: 12. Children's Privacy
section12.content: SmartSRT is not intended for users under 18 years of age. We do not knowingly collect personal information from children. If we discover that we have inadvertently collected data from a minor, we will promptly delete it from our systems.

section13.title: 13. Data Breach Notification
section13.content: In the event of a data security breach that may affect your rights, we will notify relevant supervisory authorities and affected users within the legally required timeframe (typically 72 hours). You will receive clear information about the nature of the breach and recommended protective measures.

section14.title: 14. Contact and Data Requests
section14.intro: To exercise your privacy rights or submit data-related inquiries:

section15.title: 15. Policy Updates
section15.content: We may update this Privacy Policy periodically to reflect changes in our practices or legal requirements. Material changes will be communicated via email or prominent platform notification. The "Last updated" date at the top of this policy indicates when changes were last made. Continued use of SmartSRT after updates constitutes acceptance of the revised policy.

Refund.title: Refund Policy
Refund.footerNote: By purchasing SmartSRT services, you acknowledge that you have read and agree to this Refund Policy.

section1.title: 1. Our Commitment to Satisfaction
section1.content: At SmartSRT, we strive to deliver exceptional subtitle generation services. This Refund Policy outlines the circumstances under which refunds are available and explains the process for requesting them. We aim to be fair, transparent, and responsive to our users' concerns.

subsection1.title: 2.1 Subscription Cancellation
items: You may cancel your subscription at any time through account settings
Cancellation is effective immediately, but access continues until the end of your current billing period
Auto-renewal is automatically disabled upon cancellation
No refunds are provided for unused time within the current billing period

subsection2.title: 2.2 Subscription Refund Eligibility
subsection2.intro: Subscription refunds may be granted in the following cases:

moneyBack.title: 14-Day Money-Back Guarantee
moneyBack.description: Full refund available within 14 days of initial subscription purchase (new subscribers only)

technicalIssues.title: Platform Technical Issues
technicalIssues.description: Serious technical problems preventing normal service usage that cannot be resolved by our support team

serviceOutage.title: Extended Service Outage
serviceOutage.description: When cumulative service downtime exceeds 20% of your billing period

unauthorizedPayment.title: Unauthorized Payment
unauthorizedPayment.description: Charges made without your authorization or duplicate billing errors

subsection1.title: 3.1 Eligible for Refund
items: Request submitted within 14 days of credit purchase
More than 50% of purchased credits remain unused
Technical errors preventing credit usage
Double charges or payment processing errors

subsection2.title: 3.2 Not Eligible for Refund
items: More than 50% of credits have been consumed
Request made after the 14-day window
User error or dissatisfaction with subtitle quality (quality issues should be reported for improvement)
Promotional or bonus credits

subsection1.title: 4.1 Submitting Your Request
subsection1.intro: To request a refund, contact us with the following information:

section5.title: 5. Refund Processing Methods
section5.intro: Approved refunds are processed through the following methods:

subsection1.title: 6.1 Technical Service Issues
subsection1.intro: When platform-related technical problems prevent you from using our service:
items: Full refund for persistent, unresolvable issues

subsection2.title: 6.2 Subtitle Quality Concerns
subsection2.intro: If you experience consistent subtitle quality issues:
items: Feedback and support for first 3 subtitle generations
Credit refund for recurring AI accuracy problems
Free regeneration after system improvements

subsection3.title: 6.3 Security Breaches
subsection3.intro: In the event of account security compromise:
items: Full refund for unauthorized charges
Enhanced account security measures
Investigation and preventive action

section7.title: 7. Non-Refundable Situations
section7.intro: Refunds are not available in the following cases:
items: Violations of our Terms of Service
Providing false or misleading information
Abuse or misuse of the service
Requests outside the applicable refund timeframe
User error or lack of technical knowledge
Third-party factors or market conditions beyond our control

section8.title: 8. Partial Refunds
section8.intro: In certain situations, partial refunds may be offered at our discretion:
items: When a portion of the service has been successfully utilized
For technical issues affecting specific timeframes
In cases of partial service dissatisfaction

section9.title: 9. Appeals Process
section9.intro: If your refund request is denied, you have the right to appeal:

step1.title: Submit an Appeal
step1.description: Within 14 days of the initial decision

step2.title: Provide Additional Evidence
step2.description: Include any new documentation or clarifications

step4.title: Consumer Protection
step4.description: Contact consumer arbitration services if unresolved

section10.title: 10. Pro-Rata Refund Calculation
section10.intro: For subscription refunds, we calculate pro-rata refunds as follows:
section10.formula: Refund Amount = (Remaining Days ÷ Billing Period Days) × Subscription Fee
notes: Calculations are based on calendar days

section11.title: 11. Payment Processor Policies
section11.intro: Since payments are processed through Paddle:
items: Refunds are also subject to Paddle's policies and terms
Transaction fees are determined by Paddle and may not be refundable
International payment refunds may require additional processing time
Currency exchange rate fluctuations may affect refund amounts

section12.title: 12. Contact Information
section12.intro: For refund inquiries and cancellation support:

section13.title: 13. Effective Date
section13.content: This Refund Policy becomes effective upon your purchase of SmartSRT services. We may update this policy periodically, and material changes will be communicated via email or platform notification in advance.

Terms.title: Terms of Service
Terms.footerNote: By using SmartSRT, you acknowledge that you have read, understood, and agree to be bound by these Terms of Service.

section1.title: 1. About Our Service
section1.content: SmartSRT is an AI-powered subtitle generation platform that automatically creates, translates, and synchronizes subtitles for your video content. We operate as a Software as a Service (SaaS) platform, providing cloud-based subtitle processing and management tools.

section2.title: 2. Acceptance of Terms
section2.intro: By accessing or using SmartSRT, you acknowledge and agree to:
items: Be at least 18 years of age or have consent from a legal guardian
Provide accurate and up-to-date account information
Maintain the security and confidentiality of your account credentials
Use the service in compliance with all applicable laws and regulations

section3.title: 3. Account Responsibilities
section3.content: You are solely responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of your account and password. Any activities conducted through your account are your responsibility. Please notify us immediately if you suspect unauthorized access to your account.

section4.title: 4. Subscription & Payment
section4.intro: SmartSRT offers a single subscription plan. All payments are securely processed through our payment provider (Paddle). Fees are billed in USD on a monthly basis.
items: Subscriptions automatically renew unless canceled
Service access continues until the end of your current billing cycle after cancellation
Price changes will not affect active subscribers during their current billing period

section5.title: 5. Cancellation & Refunds
section5.content: You may cancel your subscription at any time through your account settings. Upon cancellation, you will retain access to all features until the end of your current billing period.

section6.title: 6. Intellectual Property
section6.content: The SmartSRT platform, including all software, designs, logos, and content, is protected by intellectual property rights. Content you create using SmartSRT (including generated subtitles) belongs to you. We process your content solely for the purpose of providing our services and do not claim ownership of your materials.

section7.title: 7. Privacy & Data Processing
section7.intro: We collect and process your personal data exclusively to deliver our services. Your video content and audio data may be shared with AI service providers (such as OpenAI, Anthropic, or similar) for subtitle generation and translation purposes.
items: Data is processed only for service delivery and is not permanently stored by AI providers
We do not sell your personal information to third parties
For comprehensive details, please review our Privacy Policy

section8.title: 8. Service Limitations
section8.content: SmartSRT is provided on an "as is" basis. While we strive for accuracy, AI-generated subtitles may contain errors and should be reviewed before publication. We are not liable for damages resulting from service interruptions, data loss, inaccurate translations, or technical issues beyond our reasonable control.

section9.title: 9. Prohibited Activities
items: Upload content that infringes on intellectual property rights
Attempt to bypass usage limits or access restrictions
Use the service to generate harmful, illegal, or offensive content
Share account credentials or access with unauthorized parties

section10.title: 10. Service Modifications
section10.content: SmartSRT reserves the right to modify service features, pricing structures, and terms of service at any time. Material changes will be communicated in advance via email or platform notification. Continued use of the service after changes take effect constitutes acceptance of the updated terms.

section11.title: 11. Account Termination
section11.content: We reserve the right to suspend or terminate accounts that violate these terms without prior notice. Users may delete their accounts at any time through account settings or by submitting a data deletion request to our support team.

section12.title: 12. Governing Law
section12.content: These terms are governed by and construed in accordance with applicable laws. Any disputes arising from these terms or use of the service shall be resolved through appropriate legal channels.

section13.title: 13. Contact Information
section13.intro: For questions, concerns, or support regarding these terms, please contact us at:

section14.title: 14. Effective Date
section14.content: These terms become effective upon your first use of SmartSRT and remain in effect until your account is deleted or terminated.
